A briefe view of the state of the Church of England as it stood in Q. Elizabeths and King James his reigne, to the yeere 1608 being a character and history of the bishops of those times ... / written ... by Sir John Harington ..., Knight. Harington, John, Sir, 1560-1612. Chetwynd, John, 1623-1692.
[11], 211 [i.e. 213], [3] p.
Printed for Jos. Kirton ..., London : 1653.
"The epistle dedicatory" signed: John Chetwind. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Includes index.
=======
